nodes.text: Smoked terrafin loin was a type of food. Human Lieutenant Derek "Hobbie" Klivian ate this dish for breakfast the day his squadron took part in the Battle of the Corellian Queen in 5.5 ABY.
A smoked terrafin loin was briefly mentioned in the first chapter of Luke Skywalker and the Shadows of Mindor, a novel written by Matthew Stover in 2008.
